title: 2021 Mobile Office Trailer 8ft x 32ft Dual Axle
item_description:
2021 Mobile Office Trailer 8ft x 32ft Dual Axle

  • Manufactured by: SOUTHERN DIMENSIONS GROUP INC
  • Date of MFG: 01/2021   
  • Overall Length: 32ft +2ft tongue
  • Overall Width: 8ft 5 in          
  • VIN: 4S9S1EJ20MW364432
  • License #: 4TR6610
    • Expiration Date: 5/31/2026
  • Tire Size: ST235/80R16
  • Number of Axle: 2
  • Room: 1 Office, 1 Breakroom, 1 Bathroom with Exhaust Fan and 2 Utility Room
  • Building Floorplan: Included
  • California Occupancy Insignia: YES
    • This unit is not Registered with California Department of Housing and Community Development (HCD). HCD decal on this unit is a recognition of compliance in its construction but not under the jurisdiction of HCD. 

Feature Highlight:

  • Set of Aluminum Commercial Stairs, Walkway and ADA Ramp
  • Roof-top Solar Panel, 1000W Converter and Battery Charger Kit
  • 100 Amp Electric Breaker
  • Air Conditioning
  • BOSCH Tankless Water Heater
  • SEAFLO Professional Grade Pump

Note: Seller purchased the trailer in March 2025 but did not transfer it into their name. The seller has the original signed title. The Certificate of Title and Transfer Form will be mailed within 1 week of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.
